column4: I have no sound all of a sudden. What gives? I've been using Hardy for months and there's been no sound problem - now it says "No volume control GStreamer plugins and/or devices found."
Unless that changed recently. As far as I know, you can only dist-upgrade rom a live CD.
You look to be correct.  Linux_OG:  Check out http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/upgrading at the bottom of the page.
